name: UIDocumentMenuViewController
desc: A list of all the available document providers for a given file type and mode, in addition to custom menu items that you add.DeprecatedUse UIDocumentPickerViewController instead.

items.name: init(documentTypes: [String], in: UIDocumentPickerMode)
items.desc: Initializes and returns a document menu to import or open the given file types.

items.name: init(url: URL, in: UIDocumentPickerMode)
items.desc: Initializes and returns a document menu to export or move the given document.

items.name: protocol UIDocumentMenuDelegate
items.desc: A set of methods that you must implement to track user interactions with a document menu view controller.

items.name: func addOption(withTitle: String, image: UIImage?, order: UIDocumentMenuOrder, handler: () -> Void)
items.desc: Adds a custom menu item to the list of document pickers.

items.name: enum UIDocumentMenuOrder
items.desc: The insertion point for custom menu items.
